extendedInfo.description: âThe graphics are absolutely awesomeâ (Eurogamer.es)âIt pushes the mobile platform to its utmost limits and doesnât even break a sweatâ (Capsule Computers)**GAME ALERT** Play The Simpsonsâ¢: Tapped Out. THIS GAME IS LIFE-RUININGLY FUN! Create your own living, breathing Springfield for free! http://bit.ly/YynjyUBuckle up, hit the gas and hold on tight; youâre in for the ride of your life. Outrun cops, outsmart rivals â and outdrive your friends â in the most dangerous Need for Speed yet. Do you dare to be the Most Wanted?**Need for Speed Most Wanted is an immersive, high-quality game. Please note that it requires a 550MB+ download and roughly 1,900MB+ free space on your device. To speed things up, we recommend connecting to WiFi.**MAKE TROUBLE, GET WANTEDEvade a relentless police force while you clash with street racers. Race and chase hot cars like the SRT Viper GTS, Porsche 911 Carrera S, Hummer H1 Alpha, and many more. Feel the intensity of no-brakes-allowed street racing with realistic full-car damage for the first time on mobile. LEAVE YOUR MARKLog into Origin to check the Wanted List and find out who is the Most Wanted across platforms and among your friends. Then, challenge your friends and prove your racing skills in nonstop competition. GO FROM ZERO TO MOST WANTEDâ¦â¢ Drive and customize over 40 of the worldâs most exciting carsâ¢ Race the way you want! By popular demand, you can now touch or tilt to steerâ¢ Use Mods to enhance your car and get ahead of the pack in styleâ¢ Experience the action with mind-blowing graphics and intense full-car damage â¢ Earn Speed Points to unlock new carsâ¢ Trick out your phone with an exclusive Most Wanted live wallpaperYour rivals will do everything they can to stop you from getting to the top â but in this world, there can only be one Most Wanted.Be the first to know! Get inside EA info on great deals, plus the latest game updates, tips & moreâ¦VISIT US: eamobile.com/androidFOLLOW US: twitter.com/eamobileLIKE US: facebook.com/eamobileWATCH US: youtube.com/eamobilegamesCheck out more exciting games from EA like Sims FreePlay, Theme Park, World Series of Poker, and FIFA 12!For more information about the third party targeted ad serving and analytics technology in this app and data they collect, see End User License Agreement:http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/GM/

reviews.title: Best racing game on Android, PERIOD!!
reviews.comment: Update(way over due) : Finally plays awesome on my Asus Infinity tablet!! Even better on my 10\" tablet than my phones! Though it still looks and plays excellent on my HTC Evo 4G LTE, and my Samsung Note 2 as well!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: It\'s a good game but whenever I start another race it force closes and it doesn\'t even give me a refund on the mods I bought but didn\'t use. Please fix this I don\'t know what\'s wrong with it
reviews.author: Erik Lona

reviews.title: Displays black screen on HTC One
reviews.comment: The game loads up fine, and even starts the first race, but the display is completely black. Fix please.
reviews.author: Roberto DeJesus

reviews.title: On HTC One
reviews.comment: Installed fine, starts up and all the games graphics are black. You  can\'t see any of the 3d game play. 2d elements are visible.
reviews.author: Chris Rodgers

reviews.title: Not compatible
reviews.comment: Awesome game until Jellybean upgrade to 4.2 on my transformer infinity tablet. Now it won\'t work. Please fix.
reviews.author: Nelson Ferreira

reviews.title: Love
reviews.comment: This is by for the best racing mobile game for me its very fun the graphics are amazing the cars are awesome and so much game content 5 stars
reviews.author: Alan Martinez

reviews.title: Great game.
reviews.comment: The only real complaint I have, 200mph cop suv\'s are super annoying! One of the best arcade style racing game franchises ever and this iteration doesn\'t disappoint.
reviews.author: william Watson

reviews.title: Nice graphics but FREEZES!
reviews.comment: I would think a quad core Galaxy S4 (Android 4.2.2) with no other apps running should be able to run this game without freezing, but at least once a day it crashes or freezes, sometimes forcing me to hard-reset. This is unacceptable. From reading many of the other recent reviews on here, it seems like I\'m not alone.   EA - Please look into why newer high powered phones can\'t run the app reliably!
reviews.author: Joel Zipkin

reviews.title: HTC ONE BLACKSCREEN ISSUES
reviews.comment: Sorry my screen is so great and has a true HD screen. Great game but as others have been mentioning, nothing but a black screen on the new HTC ONE as far as the 3D graphics are concerned. 1 star until EA learns to support FLAGSHIP DEVICES!
reviews.author: Trey Beno

reviews.title: So far awesome game
reviews.comment: Awesome graphics, fast game play and very smooth. Love it so far.
reviews.author: Daniel Halladay

reviews.title: Great...but there\'s  problem!
reviews.comment: (Motorola Electrify M)  My phone is a very strong device, running 4.1.2 Android Jellybean. The game has stunning graphics and is fun, although it keeps crashing! All of my processes (that are okay to close) are closed and as well as all other apps! The games just keep closing. Please fix soon, or I\'d like a refund. :/ will give +5 if you fix it!!!
reviews.author: Parker Leach

reviews.title: Surprisingly good
reviews.comment: Very nice game with good and tight motion controls. Wide variety of vehicles to unlock gives good replay value. Definitely worth $1.
reviews.author: Gabriel G.

reviews.title: HTC ONE
reviews.comment: Game took forever to load when it finally did it started the first race by its self on a completely black screen. I can\'t even get to the main menu. You guys need to fix this
reviews.author: Rydell Rene

reviews.title: Looks Amazing!
reviews.comment: This game really looks stunning on the Galaxy Note 2 and plays extremely well too.  And it syncs with origin so you can compete with friends.
reviews.author: Joe Brass

reviews.title: Great game, to much lag
reviews.comment: The game is amazing and I love everything about it. But the problem is there\'s a lag sometimes which really bugs me. When this is fixed I will rate this game 5 stars.
reviews.author: Alex Sorkin

reviews.title: Runs great on galaxy S3
reviews.comment: If you ignore the touch control scheme and stick to the gyroscope controls its great...  But yet you should only play racing games with gyroscope anyways. Its better on the PlayStation Vita but great for when you can\'t have both with you at once.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: uncool
reviews.comment: have a samsung galaxy tab 2 7.0 and I HATE it. it only shows the EA symbol. why does it do that?
reviews.author: Joel Wilkerson

reviews.title: PAID BUT DOWNLOADING PROBLEM!!
reviews.comment: I paid for the game, and already tried downloading it TWO (2!) times & once its past the 99%, and starta installing it gives me an error mssg saying \"Error package not available.\" PLEASE PLEASE HELP!!! I know I have the free space on my phone!!!
reviews.author: Olga Marchuk

reviews.title: Just plain sick!
reviews.comment: Just like most wanted on ps2. It is the best time killer and easily addictive. Very fun. Never rated a game on here till now. Just wish you could do upgrades like other need for speed games. But as it is it is still excellent
reviews.author: Timothy V

reviews.title: Awesome but....
reviews.comment: I\'ve had this game since my Evo 3D but now I\'m on HTC One and this game doesn\'t work properly it loads but when you get into the very first race you can\'t see anything only hear sound fx I hope there is an update soon
reviews.author: Miggs R
